00010 using namespace Omiscid;

00013 // Initialise All stuff needed by the System Layer
00014 namespace Omiscid {
00015
00016 // Objects to prevent multiple access
00017 static Mutex OmiscidSystemLayerInitMutex;
00018 static unsigned int OmiscidSystemLayerInitInstanceCount = 0;
00019
00020
00021 // Function to do mandatory initialisation
00022
00023 // Init Socket
00024 static void     OmiscidSocketInit()
00025 {
00026 #ifdef WIN32
00027     // Start Windows Socket subsystem
00028     WORD wVersionRequested;
00029     WSADATA wsaData;
00030
00031     wVersionRequested = MAKEWORD( 2, 2 );
00032     int err = WSAStartup( wVersionRequested, &wsaData );
00033 #endif
00034     Socket::GetDnsNameSolvingOption();
00035 }
00036
00037 // Object used to initialise
00038 OmiscidSystemLayerInitClass OmiscidSystemLayerInit;
00039
00040 OmiscidSystemLayerInitClass::OmiscidSystemLayerInitClass()
00041 {
00042     // Enter locker
00043     OmiscidSystemLayerInitMutex.EnterMutex();
00044
00045     OmiscidSystemLayerInitInstanceCount++;
00046     if ( OmiscidSystemLayerInitInstanceCount == 1 )
00047     {
00048         // First instance, do init for Layer System
00049         OmiscidTrace( "Init System layer\n" );
00050
00051         // Init random for main thread
00052         RandomInit();
00053
00054         // Init Socket
00055         OmiscidSocketInit();
00056     }
00057
00058     // Leave locker
00059     OmiscidSystemLayerInitMutex.LeaveMutex();
00060 }
00061
00062 OmiscidSystemLayerInitClass::~OmiscidSystemLayerInitClass()
00063 {
00064     // Enter locker
00065     OmiscidSystemLayerInitMutex.EnterMutex();
00066
00067     OmiscidSystemLayerInitInstanceCount--;
00068     if ( OmiscidSystemLayerInitInstanceCount == 0 )
00069     {
00070         // Last instance, do reset for Layer System
00071         OmiscidTrace( "Free System layer\n" );
00072
00073         // Nothing to do for the moment
00074     }
00075
00076     // Leave locker
00077     OmiscidSystemLayerInitMutex.LeaveMutex();
00078 }
00079
00080 } // namespace Omiscid
